synopsis.text: Adepts from the Church, including Sasha the Martyr and his partner Hana, embark on a mission to retrieve the elusive Magdalena of Thunder, one of the five unique and irreplaceable High Ancient Circuits. Their search leads them to an all-girls private academy in Japan, where one of the students is believed to possess the artifact. To blend in, Sasha must disguise himself as a female student, adding a layer of complexity to their quest. However, they are not the only ones seeking the Magdalena of Thunder, as rival Adepts also close in on the academy, setting the stage for a thrilling race against time.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
